item.title: Scott Bessent Says US Tariff Revenues Could Top $1 Trillion, Slash Deficit by $4 Trillion
item.description: Bessent said he expects tariff revenues to climb further in September, with the Treasury already collecting record sums.

item.title: This Department Store Chain Saw Retail Chatter Jump 783% Ahead Of Q2 Results On Wednesday – Find Out More
item.description: Kohl’s is expected to post second-quarter revenue of $3.37 billion and earnings per share of $0.30, according to data compiled by Fiscal AI.

item.title: Aduro Clean Technologies Provides Update on NGP Pilot Plant Progress
Trump Says ‘Substantial’ Tariffs On Furniture Coming Soon
item.description: The comment comes after Trump ordered a 50-day investigation into potential duties on furniture imports last week.

item.title: Critical Metals Stock Gains On Ucore Rare Earth Deal: Retail Optimism Jumps
item.description: The arrangement will provide Ucore with feedstock from Critical Metals’ Tanbreez Project in Greenland over 10 years.
